content: As an AI language model, I do not have access to the specific training routines of individual athletes leading up to the 2014 Commonwealth Games. However, it is typical for athletes to fine-tune their training regimens leading up to major competitions, including adjusting the intensity and focus of their workouts, increasing their recovery time and fine-tuning their nutrition and hydration strategies. Factors such as injury prevention and rehabilitation, climate and altitude acclimatization, specialized equipment and gear, and mental preparation may also play a role in an athlete’s training routine.
